mapper.select: select TO_CHAR(po.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ORDER_DATE, po.ORDER_NUM, po.ORDER_STATUS, od.ORDER_CNT, p.PRD_NUM, p.THUM, p.PRD_NAME, p.PRD_PRICE, p.PRD_DISCOUNT from PRODUCT_ORDER po, ORDER_DETAIL od, PRODUCT p where (po.ORDER_NUM=od.ORDER_NUM AND od.PRD_NUM=p.PRD_NUM) AND po.id=#{id} AND po.ORDER_NUM=#{orderNum} ORDER BY po.ORDER_DATE DESC

select po.ORDER_NUM, da.DELI_ZIPCODE, da.DELI_ADDR, da.DELI_DETAIL_ADDR, da.RECEIVER, da.DELI_PHONE, po.DELI_REQ from DELIVERY_ADDRESS da, PRODUCT_ORDER po where (da.ORDER_NUM=po.ORDER_NUM) AND po.ID=#{id} AND po.ORDER_NUM=#{orderNum}
